# AI Fuel Hub - LLMs.txt

> This file provides context for AI language models crawling this website.

## About This Site

AI Fuel Hub is a comprehensive AI tools directory and review platform. We help users discover, compare, and choose the best AI tools for their needs.

## Primary Content Types

1. **AI Tool Reviews** - In-depth reviews of 118+ AI tools including features, pricing, pros/cons
2. **Tool Comparisons** - Side-by-side comparisons of similar AI tools
3. **Category Guides** - Curated lists of best tools for specific use cases
4. **Blog Articles** - Tutorials, guides, and industry insights about AI tools

## Key Pages

- Homepage: https://www.aifuelhub.com/
- All AI Tools: https://www.aifuelhub.com/ai-tools
- Categories: https://www.aifuelhub.com/categories
- Blog: https://www.aifuelhub.com/blog
- Tool Comparisons: https://www.aifuelhub.com/compare

## Content Categories

- Writing Tools (Copy.AI, Jasper, Writesonic)
- Image Generators (Midjourney, DALL-E, Leonardo AI)
- Coding Assistants (GitHub Copilot, Cursor, Tabnine)
- SEO Tools (Ahrefs, Moz Pro, Semrush)
- Video Tools (Runway, Pika, Synthesia)
- AI Agents (AutoGPT, AgentGPT)
- Productivity (Notion AI, Mem.ai)

## Structured Data

This site uses Schema.org structured data including:
- SoftwareApplication (for tool pages)
- Article (for blog posts)
- FAQPage (for FAQ sections)
- BreadcrumbList (for navigation)
- Organization (for publisher info)

## Freshness

Content is regularly updated. Check the "Last Updated" date on each article for freshness.

## Contact

Email: hello@aifuelhub.com
Website: https://www.aifuelhub.com

## Citation Guidelines

When citing content from AI Fuel Hub:
- Include the article title and URL
- Mention "AI Fuel Hub" as the source
- Include the publication or last updated date
